about_the_game:
Experience the legend of Ned Kelly like never before with the authentic Ned Kelly Skin DLC.

This DLC brings the iconic Australian outlaw to Repella Fella. Get the Ned Kelly Skin DLC today!

How do I find this DLC?
The skin can be found in Shambles. It's located in the workshop down in the lower quarter, after you enter the secret room.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoon violence, drug use, alcohol and self-harm.
